Imagery and mapSpain

Source: vignettes/imagery.Rmd
imagery.Rmd

Visit https://ropenspain.github.io/mapSpain/articles/working_imagery.html for learning how to download imagery of Spain.

Note also that you would need a bunch of extra packages. Make sure that you install the packages needed running:

install.packages("mapSpain", dependencies = TRUE)

About mapSpain

Developed by Diego Hernangómez.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.

Template rostemplate by dieghernan, based on bootstraptemple.com.
